item.description:
The Master is the newest film from Paul Thomas Anderson. On the suggestion of Laurie, I added it to the calendar. Let's go to the 4:15 show at Solomon Pond Mall. We'll meet in the lobby around 4:00 Sunday afternoon. If you need to reach me, call or text 508-981-0455.

The Plot (from imdb.com): After returning from the Second World War, having witnessed many horrors, a charismatic intellectual creates a faith based organization in an attempt to provide meaning to his life. He becomes known as "The Master". His right-hand man, a former drifter, begins to question both the belief system and The Master as the organization grows and gains a fervent following. Starring Joaquin Phoenix, Philip Seymour Hoffman, and Amy Adams.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the lobby. I look like my photo, but with a goatee.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The Master
